required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of PF-06882961 in Japanese Adults With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
clinical_study.official_title: AN 8-WEEK PHASE 1, RANDOMIZED, DOUBLE-BLIND, SPONSOR-OPEN, PLACEBO-CONTROLLED, PARALLEL GROUP STUDY TO EVALUATE THE SAFETY, TOLERABILITY, PHARMACOKINETICS, AND PHARMACODYNAMICS OF TWICE DAILY PF-06882961 ADMINISTRATION IN JAPANESE ADULTS WITH TYPE 2 DIABETES MELLITUS

brief_summary.textblock: This is a Phase 1, randomized, double blind (sponsor open), parallel, placebo controlled, twice daily oral dosing study of PF 06882961 in adult Japanese participants with T2DM inadequately controlled on diet and exercise alone.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Treatment Emergent Treatment-Related Adverse Events
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline up to 35 days after last dose (Day 91)

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Laboratory Abnormalities
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline up to 14 days after last dose (Day 70)

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Clinically Significant Change From Baseline in Vital Signs
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline up to 14 days after last dose (Day 70)

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Abnormal Electrocardiogram (ECG)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline up to 14 days after last dose (Day 70)

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to Reach Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration

arm_group.description: Participants will be titrated up to 2 weeks to reach desired dose level
Participants will be titrated up to 4 weeks to reach desired dose level
Participants will be titrated up to 6 weeks to reach desired dose level

intervention.description: 3 matching placebo tablets taken twice a day (BID)
Participants will be randomized to one of 3 active doses (40, 80, or 120 mg), taking 3 tablets twice daily for 8 weeks.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients with T2DM who are treated with diet and exercise
- HbA1c greater than or equal to 7% and less than or equal to 10.5%
- Total body weight >50 kg (110 lb) with BMI 22.5 to 45.4 kg/m^2
Exclusion Criteria:
- Any condition possibly affecting drug absorption
- Diagnosis of Type 1 diabetes
- History of myocardial infarction, unstable angina, arterial revascularization, stroke, heart failure, or transient ischemic attack within 6 months of screening
- Any malignancy not considered cured
- Personal or family history of MTC or MEN2, or participants with suspected MTC
- Acute pancreatitis or history of chronic pancreatitis
- Symptomatic gallbladder disease
- Known medical history of active proliferative retinopathy and/or macular edema
- Known history of HIV, hepatitis B, hepatitis C or syphilis
- Supine blood pressure greater than or equal to 160 mmHg (systolic) or greater than or equal to 100 mmHg (diastolic)
- Clinically relevant ECG abnormalities
- Positive urine drug test

link.description: To obtain contact information for a study center near you, click here.

patient_data.ipd_description: Pfizer will provide access to individual de-identified participant data and related study documents (e.g. protocol, Statistical Analysis Plan (SAP), Clinical Study Report (CSR)) upon request from qualified researchers, and subject to certain criteria, conditions, and exceptions. Further details on Pfizer's data sharing criteria and process for requesting access can be found at: https://www.pfizer.com/science/clinical_trials/trial_data_and_results/data_requests.
